name: EGGSCAPE
summary:
🚨 WARNING: THIS GAME IS NOT NORMAL.

You are about to enter a dimension where EGGS go FULL MAYHEM.

This is Eggscape – the wildest, loudest, most explosive VR party in the UNIVERSE. 🥚💣🎉

🥚 BE AN EGG.
Not just any egg. Be a wall-jumping, bazooka-blasting, power-up-slamming, chaos-spreading SUPERSTAR EGG.

WHY?
Because eggs were never meant to chill in the fridge.
They were meant to FIGHT.
To RUN.
To FLY through lava.
To DANCE with jetpacks.
To SHOOT a bazooka while wearing a banana hat.

🎮...
